name: CSIT-25006 Adversary Debut: NIMBLE SPIDER Exploits Multiple Vulnerabilities to Facilitate Initial Access Opportunities
summary:
Topic: eCrime || Adversary: NIMBLE SPIDER, FROZEN SPIDER, RECESS SPIDER

Key Points
NIMBLE SPIDER is an eCrime adversary who has collaborated with or provided access to several other threat actors, including the Big Game Hunting (BGH) adversaries RECESS SPIDER and FROZEN SPIDER. The adversary has likely been active since at least June 2022.
